item.title: By: anil s m ingle

item.description: sir, i am student of nit warangal cse i want to do project there i am recently doing project on web minnning in iiit hyderabad . can it possible thaT i get this opertunity in my winter vacation or my next summer vacation hoping that u consider this request hoping to get ur response thanking u anil s m ingle nit warangal
item.content:encoded:
sir,
i am student of nit warangal cse i want to do project there i am recently doing project on web minnning in iiit hyderabad . can it possible thaT i get this opertunity in my winter vacation or my next summer vacation hoping that u consider this request
hoping to get ur response
